abstract: Microsoft chief Steve Ballmer said on Thursday the only discussion he’s had with Yahoo‘s top executive was a single phone call, but is holding out hopes for further talks.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft chief Steve Ballmer said on Thursday the only discussion he’s had with Yahoo‘s top executive was a single phone call, but is holding out hopes for further talks.

headline.main: Microsoft’s Ballmer Holds Out Hope For Yahoo Talks

abstract: Microsoft knows what it wants to offer to companies through its new cloud-based services: absolutely everything it sells as software.
snippet: Microsoft knows what it wants to offer to companies through its new cloud-based services: absolutely everything it sells as software.
lead_paragraph: Look at the picture above. It’s an original Steve Ballmer created before my eyes on the wall of a conference room here at The Times.

headline.main: Steve Ballmer Maps Microsoft’s Cloud-y Future

abstract: Willie Sutton robbed banks because “that’s where the money is.” Steve Ballmer says Microsoft continues to pursue Web search for the same reason.
snippet: Willie Sutton robbed banks because “that’s where the money is.” Steve Ballmer says Microsoft continues to pursue Web search for the same reason.
lead_paragraph: If you are making something that is growing and profitable, why throw billions at something else that has kept losing money and market share?

headline.main: Why Microsoft Continues to Chase Internet Search
